Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run home run in the first inning
Others: Tanner Bibee shut down the Tigers in the top of the first
A.J. Hinch used an opener in Tyler Holton
Stephen Vogt made his postseason managerial debut

Detailed Analysis.Guardians Bullpen Performance: The Guardians bullpen, comprised of Cade Smith, Tim Herrin, Hunter Gaddis, and Emmanuel Clase, combined to allow no hits and no runs with seven strikeouts in 4.1 innings.
Detailed Analysis.Stephen Vogt's Management: Vogt seemed to push all the right buttons, as he went to his bullpen early and pulled Tanner Bibee at the first sign of trouble after 4.2 innings.
Detailed Analysis.Lane Thomas' Performance: Thomas, who struggled during the regular season, garnered plenty of praise on social media after his clutch hit in the first inning.
Detailed Analysis.Tarik Skubal vs. Matthew Boyd: In Game 2, the Tigers will deploy ace Tarik Skubal, while the Guardians will counter with former Tigers pitcher Matthew Boyd.
